attributes.action: Ban the sale of rawhide dog chews
attributes.additional_details: Rawhide is dangerous for dogs. It is a huge chocking hazard. It is hard to digest and can cause internal blockages. It has no nutritional benefits. Manufacturing often uses harsh chemicals like formaldehyde, bleach, arsenic or lye which is a toxic risk. Glue is used to press rawhide into shapes. It is also often dyed to hide discolouration.  It has risk of carrying salmonella and e coli.  The production and sale of them should be illegal
attributes.background: Ban all sales of rawhide dogs chews

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Ban the manufacture, import and sale of Rawhide as a dog treat
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751913
